speaker: Mary
text: *Mary looks around at the festive decorations, the laughter of her friends filling the room.* Alright, let's get the gift unwrapping started!

speaker: Duncan
text: *Duncan chuckles.* You're always in such a rush, Missy. Fine, go ahead.

speaker: Anna
text: I'm so excited to see your face when you open our parents' gift, Mary. You're going to love it!

speaker: Mary
text: *Mary eyes the small box her father brings from the garage.* Um... is this it?

speaker: Dad
text: *Smiling broadly, he hands the box to Mary.* You bet, kiddo. Open it up!

speaker: Mary
text: *Mary unwraps the small box. Her eyes widen with excitement as she takes in the words 'Raspberry Pi'.* Oh my gosh, is this... a computer?! My own computer?!

speaker: Mom
text: *She laughs as Mary jumps up to hug her.* Yes, it is, sweetheart. Happy birthday!

speaker: Duncan
text: *Duncan laughs.* Watch out world, here comes the next big Linux user!

speaker: Anna
text: *Anna looks confused.* I don't get it, but I'm glad you're happy, Mary.

speaker: Mary
text: *Mary hugs Anna.* Thanks, Anna. This is the best gift ever. I can't wait to start learning!
